title: Update Failed:  Unspecified Error Occurred
body:
Apparently, I am on the old client.  I uninstalled League of Legends, and then I reinstalled it as Administrator in accordance with this guide:  https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions

Windows 10.  64-bit.  The update will not even move past ZERO percent!  Every single time I take a break from LoL and return I have an issue trying to patch this game.  Really, it's pure annoyance.

Anyhow, what steps should I take?

I been having the same damn problem and it seems there is no fix to it
Trust me, i have installed and uninstall the damn game for a week now and nothing 
I been in many threads and none of them show me how to fix the damn thing.
I might as well quit the damn game since i cant play it.

Running as admin is a solid start, because getting an error this early is usually caused a security setting or antivirus blocking your game files from getting scanned.  Be sure to go over each step of that guide to fix this up.  Curious, are you still on the legacy client?
It's 0.71.0.45 in the bottom left corner.  I probably am since it's been a month or more since I last logged in.  Before the new champions were released.
